name: Gravity Stomp
description:
Welcome to a strange world where gravity isn't consistent. Use your power of controlling gravity to stomp on your friends' heads. This was made for the August Philly Dev Night game jam (Update: won 3rd place!). The theme was down the rabbit hole.

CC0 assets were used in the creation of this project:

Forest background - Tamara - http://opengameart.org/users/ramtam
Fantasy tiles - Carl Olsson - http://opengameart.org/users/surt
Witch sprite - Ivan - http://opengameart.org/users/nosok
Music - Insert Flutter by statusq - http://freepd.com/Atmosphere/Insert%20Flutter

Controls (Xbox Controller/Joystick only @ the moment):

D-pad Left - Move left

D-pad Right - Move right

D-pad Up - Move up

D-pad Down - Move down

Y/Triangle - Shift gravity up

B/Circle - Shift gravity right

A/Cross - Shift gravity down

X/Square - Shift gravity left
